cui_name: Malignant tumor of posterior wall of nasopharynx
reasoning: Nasopharyngeal cancer subtype by anatomical wall location. Posterior wall is most common site (~45% of NPC). Global NPC incidence ~1.0 per 100k; posterior wall estimate ~0.45 per 100k. Based on GLOBOCAN 2005 NPC data with anatomical distribution from nasopharyngeal cancer epidemiology.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC); anatomical distribution from nasopharyngeal cancer registries
